name: Jumping Knight (QwePek)
description:
Get to the top by testing your patience and determination. If you feel up to it, good luck! You will encounter many obstacles such as locked doors that need to be opened with keys, moving platforms, rotating planets and many other scary moments on your way to the top. It is one of the most skill-testing games in the world. Only a few manage to dominate the entire game. 

Arcade, retro style, enhancing reflexes and patience

EVERY JUMP COUNTS 

DON'T DISTRACT YOURSELF OR YOU WILL FALL 

EASY to play HARD to MASTER
